mapper.insert: insert into review (member_id, place_id, review_title, review_content, review_date, rating) values (#{memberId}, #{placeId}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewDate}, #{rating})
mapper.select: select review_id, member_id, place_id, review_title, review_content, review_date, rating from review where review_id = #{reviewId}
